textAfterTable: Brand mixtures Not Available Salts Not Available Categories Antiviral Agents Reverse Transcriptase Inhibitors CAS number 142340-99-6 Weight Average: 501.4705 Monoisotopic: 501.198849537 Chemical Formula C20H32N5O8P InChI Key WOZSCQDILHKSGG-UHFFFAOYSA-N InChI InChI=1S/C20H32N5O8P/c1-19(2,3)17(26)30-11-32-34(28,33-12-31-18(27)20(4,5)6)13-29-8-7-25-10-24-14-15(21)22-9-23-16(14)25/h9-10H,7-8,11-13H2,1-6H3,(H2,21,22,23) IUPAC Name [({[2-(6-amino-9H-purin-9-yl)ethoxy]methyl}({[(2,2-dimethylpropanoyl)oxy]methoxy})phosphoryl)oxy]methyl 2,2-dimethylpropanoate SMILES CC(C)(C)C(=O)OCOP(=O)(COCCN1C=NC2=C(N)N=CN=C12)OCOC(=O)C(C)(C)C Taxonomy Description This compound belongs to the class of organic compounds known as 6-aminopurines. These are purines that carry an amino group at position 6. Purine is a bicyclic aromatic compound made up of a pyrimidine ring fused to an imidazole ring.
